archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0870
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able to reconcile all of our interconnect usage on our network between other operators so that we are can ensure we are not losing or overcharging any of our interconnect revenue

properties.value: Requirement for IPB. IPB exports the traffic data. Requirement moved to IPB list of BUCs.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
